howitworks.title: How It Works

faq.a1: X-Streamify is your personal digital vault where you can upload, store, and stream your movies, documents, photos, and family memories ‚Äî all in your own private cloud library.
faq.a2: Yes. X-Streamify helps you manage your own legally owned media. Laws vary by region, so you should only upload content you own and have the right to digitize for personal use.
faq.q3: Can I access my library on any device?
faq.a3: Yes ‚Äî once uploaded, you can access and stream your movies, documents, and photos on phones, tablets, smart TVs, and computers using your private account.
faq.q4: Do I need special equipment to digitize my DVDs?
faq.a4: No ‚Äî you don‚Äôt need complex equipment. A compatible DVD drive and our simple upload tools make digitizing your DVDs easy. X-Streamify is also working toward providing a seamless hardware solution for subscribers.
faq.q5: What file types can I upload?
faq.a5: You can upload common video formats like MP4, MKV, AVI, and MOV, most standard image formats, and widely used document files. Our system is designed to support a broad range of media types for smooth and secure access.
faq.q6: Will my uploads stay private and secure?
faq.a6: Absolutely. Your uploads remain private and secure. Files are encrypted during transfer and stored in your private vault with strict access controls. Only you can see your uploads.
faq.q7: Can I share my library with family members?
faq.a7: Yes ‚Äî you can add family members to your account and control what each person can access. Every profile can have its own permissions and personalized library experience.
faq.q8: How do I upload my DVDs to X-Streamify?
faq.a8: It‚Äôs simple ‚Äî insert your DVD into your computer (or the X-Stream Port), use the X-Streamify Uploader to digitize it, and it‚Äôs automatically added to your personal library.
faq.q9: Can I upload Blu-ray, standard DVDs, or 4K discs?
faq.a9: Yes ‚Äî X-Streamify supports standard DVDs, Blu-ray, and 4K Ultra HD discs. Insert your disc into a compatible drive or the X-Stream Port, and our uploader handles the rest.
faq.a10: Yes ‚Äî X-Streamify works worldwide. As long as you have an internet connection, you can securely access your personal library from anywhere.
faq.q11: How fast is streaming after upload?
faq.a11: Streaming is fast and seamless ‚Äî once upload and processing are complete, your content is ready to play within minutes.
